product_name: CliniqueClinique Pop Plush Creamy Lip Gloss
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Pop Plush Creamy Lip Gloss is an ultra-cushiony, super juicy gloss that hugs lips with shine and all-day hydration. It's the lip gloss everyone's talking about on social media.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin Types.Finally, a gloss that feels as good as it looks.Coats lips with high shine and soothing hydration, all while delivering a pop of color.The nourishing formula takes care of your lips while you wear it.Hyaluronic acid helps lock in moisture and leaves lips looking plump with hydration.A special blend of aloe butter, avocado butter, and shea butter helps condition lips.A unique mix of butters, waxes, and light-reflecting ester amp up shine, for lips that look bouncy and defined.The hourglass-shaped doe foot wraps around lips for super smooth and precise application, delivering the perfect slick of color.Glides on effortlessly to an ultra-shiny finish that lasts all day.In 10 shades to complement every skin tone, lip tone, and mood, including universally flattering Black Honey Pop, a glossy take on Clinique's cult classic lip shade.Includes 4 shimmery shades: Brulee Pop, Rosewater Pop, Airkiss Pop, and Velour Pop.Formula benefits: Immediate and all-day hydration. Immediate lip definition. Immediate and all-day shine.Allergy tested. Fragrance free.Key IngredientsHyaluronic acid helps lock in moisture for lips that look plump with hydration.Aloe butter, avocado butter, and shea butter help condition lips.Item 2598049How To UsePull applicator from vial and sweep gloss across lips.Can be worn alone or layered with other lip products.Remove with Clinique Take the Day Off Makeup Remover for Lids, Lashes, & Lips.IngredientsTriisostearyl Citrate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Microcrystalline Wax\Cera Microcristallina\Cire Microcristalline, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Sterols, Octyldodecanol, Polyethylene, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Phytosterols, Linolenic Acid, Linoleic Acid, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Lauryl Pca, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caprylyl Glycol, Oleic Acid, Lecithin, Hexylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Tocopheryl Acetate. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Carmine (CI 75470), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 22 Lake (CI 45380), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Pull applicator from vial and sweep gloss across lips.Can be worn alone or layered with other lip products.Remove with Clinique Take the Day Off Makeup Remover for Lids, Lashes, & Lips.

reviews.headline: First Time to Purchase but Won't Be the Last!
reviews.comments: I have a very difficult time finding a lip shade that won't spread due to my nervous habit of constantly chewing on my lips.  This is it!  Would be excellent for a young girl or a shiny but natural look as well.

reviews.headline: I would not ever repurchase but it was ok once
reviews.comments: If you really need a red gloss to go over a red lipstick then i understand getting the black honey. but its so so so sticky and not a lot of product and the color is patchy when you apply and VANISHES within minutes and leaves behind so sticky

reviews.headline: Love this color!
reviews.comments: I get compliments on this all the time!

reviews.headline: Finally a lip gloss that's not sticky.
reviews.comments: Bought this in the black honey color. Second time purchasing, love it!

reviews.headline: Black honey lip gloss
reviews.comments: Purchased this to try black honey shade for first time-  was hoping it would have slight rosy undertone but on me it was dark mauve dont really like cool toned shades. On some ppl almost looks like a red. Did like the formula felt hydrating.

reviews.headline: I LOVE this color so much, it's my go-to peachy pink!
reviews.comments:
I love this Clinique lipgloss, and originally, I got the Rosewater Pop color as part of a mini trial set my Má didn't want.
     I was a little hesitant at first because I thought the bright color would be too harsh against my extremely pale skin tone (I try to stay away from that 'harsh cherry red lip' look, it's not complimentary on me), but once I put it on I was OBSESSED.
     Color is sheer, not too vibrant or distracting but also noticable, great for that warm, summery, pink watermelon/strawberry esque makeup.
     I only knock one star off for the fact it's a liiiittle bit of a sticky formula, and I have a lot of other glosses that do preform better on that, but it's not enougg to the point that it's noticable to others, annoying, gets in your way, or a sensory issue.

reviews.headline: Absolutely Love
reviews.comments: Subtle and Perfect

reviews.headline: I would rebuy
reviews.comments: Love it

reviews.headline: The BEST!!!
reviews.comments: Strawberry pop is amazing for blondes! I If you like the Rosewater one youll love this color as well. Surprised that it stays on so long and I love the way my lips feel hysted!

reviews.headline: Love this better than the actual lip stick version
reviews.comments: The color looks so much nicer as a gloss, and for the type of product it is, it lasts long and feels nice on.  Goes great with a matching lip liner as well, or alone.

reviews.headline: I am buying again
reviews.comments: Love this color on me! Don't be fooled or judge a book by its cover. I literally didn't think i'd like it but I tried it and it looks soooo good

reviews.headline: Love it! Lightens dark lips
reviews.comments: I love this gloss!! Yes it's a bit sticky but what moisturizing high lip gloss isn't? No sensitivity issues and I have allergies and if something touches my lips I'll know instantly bc my lips will swell. So nice to find products that work for sensitive skin! Also, I have pigmented lips, the oh snap from colour pop matches my inner lips perfectly and the outer edges are a neutral to warm brown. I bought the creme brulee and wasn't impressed with the color payoff but as a topper it's awesome! Shimmery not glittery so it adds dimension and plump to the lips. A warm brown so you can play with liners and other lipsticks to customize. The real pro is that I decided to wear it as is at night since it's pretty moisturizing and lo and behold, in the morning my pigmentation looked lighter! I don't know what caused it, but my lips hadn't been this light since I was a child! I've been using it as a lip mask at night. Anyhow, the strawberry pop is super cute too! A little too barbie pink for me at first since I have light warm neutral tan skin but calms down to a nice natural pink blushed lip color. Love these! I do miss the splash+hydration pop lip glosses formula. Please bring them back!

reviews.headline: This gloss is superb!
reviews.comments: This lip gloss is easy to use, lasts for hours on my lips with or without lipstick and I highly recommend!

reviews.headline: This gloss is lovely and keeps my lips protected and pretty!
reviews.comments: I love this gloss so much, I plan to try other colors, too.  Highly recommended!

reviews.headline: Subtle color
reviews.comments: I wanted a subtle color with a little gloss.  It's a little bit thick, but feels nice on.

reviews.headline: Stick with the liostick
reviews.comments: This product does not stay on the lips. It has no staying power whatsoever.  It's not good over the black honey lipstick because it makes that color disappear quicker.

reviews.headline: Loved it
reviews.comments: Such a pretty color

reviews.headline: I want every color
reviews.comments: I have chiffon pop, and strawberry pop, and they are both super pretty! The best thing about this gloss is that it literally feels like a balm, its super rich, not sticky, and its my GO TO now!

reviews.headline: Love the black honey color!
reviews.comments: Gorgeous lip color! It stays on nicely and even when I have to reapply it, there's still color on my lips. The applicator is nice and not too big so I can easily get product on in the corners. Highly recommend, black honey color is 10/10!

reviews.headline: It's a nice gloss
reviews.comments: I bought black honey gloss and it looks dark but it goes on a nice shade and isn't sticky

media.headline: thank you tiktok
media.caption: look how pretty this gloss is !!

faceoff_positive.comments: I love this gloss!! Yes it's a bit sticky but what moisturizing high lip gloss isn't? No sensitivity issues and I have allergies and if something touches my lips I'll know instantly bc my lips will swell. So nice to find products that work for sensitive skin! Also, I have pigmented lips, the oh snap from colour pop matches my inner lips perfectly and the outer edges are a neutral to warm brown. I bought the creme brulee and wasn't impressed with the color payoff but as a topper it's awesome! Shimmery not glittery so it adds dimension and plump to the lips. A warm brown so you can play with liners and other lipsticks to customize. The real pro is that I decided to wear it as is at night since it's pretty moisturizing and lo and behold, in the morning my pigmentation looked lighter! I don't know what caused it, but my lips hadn't been this light since I was a child! I've been using it as a lip mask at night. Anyhow, the strawberry pop is super cute too! A little too barbie pink for me at first since I have light warm neutral tan skin but calms down to a nice natural pink blushed lip color. Love these! I do miss the splash+hydration pop lip glosses formula. Please bring them back!
faceoff_positive.headline: Love it! Lightens dark lips

faceoff_negative.comments: Once again, I was excited to try a new gloss/lip product, but this gloss (I got the rose color) contains large chunks of glitter. Nowhere in the description is a glitter or shimmer described, and it doesn't show up in the pictures at all. Unfortunately, I am not going to wear a gloss that is so glitter heavy. That's not what I thought I was getting and not what I wanted. Which is a shame, because otherwise the gloss seems lovely. Too bad …
faceoff_negative.headline: Foiled Again By Glitter

rollup.name: Clinique Pop Plush Creamy Lip Gloss
